# Specification Quality Checklist

**Feature**: 002-tkinter-ui
**Date**: 2025-11-12
**Reviewer**: Auto-generated

## Completeness

- [x] **User Scenarios**: Contains at least 3 user stories with clear acceptance scenarios
- [x] **Requirements**: Includes functional requirements with MUST/SHOULD/MAY language
- [x] **Success Criteria**: Defines measurable outcomes for feature success
- [x] **Edge Cases**: Addresses potential failure modes and boundary conditions
- [x] **Key Entities**: Identifies important data structures and concepts

## Clarity

- [x] **User Stories**: Written in "As a... I want... so that..." format
- [x] **Acceptance Scenarios**: Use Given/When/Then format for testability
- [x] **Requirements**: Clear, unambiguous statements without implementation details
- [x] **Prioritization**: Stories and requirements have clear priority levels (P1/P2/P3)

## Testability

- [x] **Independent Testing**: Each user story can be tested without depending on others
- [x] **Measurable Criteria**: Success criteria include specific metrics and thresholds
- [x] **Acceptance Scenarios**: Provide concrete examples of expected behavior

## Feasibility

- [x] **Technology Alignment**: Requirements align with active technologies (Python 3.12 + Tkinter)
- [x] **Integration Points**: Clear integration with existing CLI (--ui flag)
- [x] **Resource Requirements**: No external dependencies beyond standard library

## Validation

- [x] **No Implementation Details**: Specification focuses on what, not how
- [x] **Business Value**: Each requirement ties back to user needs
- [x] **Scope Control**: Feature scope is appropriately bounded for incremental delivery

## Status: PASSED

All quality criteria have been met. The specification is ready for the planning phase.
